author: XURA
content: I AM YES USER,, I DIDNT PAID MY LAST 2 MONTH BILL,, FOR THIS MONTH, I CANT USE THE SERVICES,, LETS SAY FROM NOW ON I DONT PAY FOR MY BILL,, AND IF I WANT TO ACTIVATED THE LINE,, DO I HAVE TO PAY ONLY THE OUTSTANDING BILL OR I NEED TO PAY FOR THE OTHER MONTH REGARDLESS I DONT USED THE SERVICES..
